snippet: Federal biologists will consider increasing Endangered Species Act protections for the northern spotted owl, reflecting the bird’s continued slide toward extinction despite steep logging cutbacks in the Northwest.
lead_paragraph: Federal biologists will consider increasing Endangered Species Act protections for the northern spotted owl, reflecting the bird’s continued slide toward extinction despite steep logging cutbacks in the Northwest.

headline.main: More Protections Possible for Spotted Owl
headline.print_headline: More Protections Possible For Spotted Owl
